alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 23 at 1:12PM MDT until October 25 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 13 inches. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, and Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
